title: vENugAna ramaNA ati vitaraNa guNa
sahitya:
vENugAna ramaNA ati vitaraNa guNa nipuNa


anupallavi

  cANUra mura mada hara nanda nandanA sauvarNa lOla kuNDala dyuti vadanA 


caraNam    kAruNya kOmaLa shyAmaL nayanA kALindi taTa rUDha pallava nayanA 
cAru kalApa rAjita jita madanA saurabha valayita vanamAikA bharaNA
